rules.description: FN: double right shift to shift+[semicolon]
FN: double right option to command+[v]
FN: caps_lock to escape
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0)
SpaceFN: Space+[o] to control+[spacebar], Space+[i] to command+[6]
SpaceFN: Space+[wdeg] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+[cv] to copy, paste
SpaceFN: Space+[hbsx] to delete_or_backspace, delete word, delete_or_backspace, delete_forward
SpaceFN: Space+[r] to $
SpaceFN: Space+[n] to command+[n], Space+[m] to command+[m], Space+[f] to command+[f]
SpaceFN: [?] to option
SpaceFN: Space+[tab] to shift+[tab]
SpaceFN: Space+[a] to command+[left_arrow], Space+[m] to delete_left_line
SpaceFN: Space+[q] to word back move
SpaceFN: Space+[comma] to command+[comma]
SpaceFN: delete_mode: j to delete_or_backspace, l to delete
SpaceFN: Delete Mode: yd, yk
FN: fn enables FN mode
Change Won (₩) to grave accent (`) in Korean layout.
